Package refactor.message

Class MessageMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • refactor.message.MessageMetadata
  • public class MessageMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores information about a Message's metadata. It has all the entries that have been defined, and is also responsible for encoding said metadata. The metadata is composed of entries, with each one having a label, that is its identifying name, and a value which is, obviously, its value
    Since:
    20.06.2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Filipe Medeiros - filipesilvamedeiros@gmail.com, Filipe Medeiros - github.com/filipesmedeiros

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)
        Override of the Object's equals(Object other) method. Simply compares all metadata entries. All of them have to be equal for the MessageMetadatas to be equal
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        other - The other Object (most likely an instance of MessageMetadata) to compare with this
        Returns:
        True if both MessageMetadatas are equal (all metadata entries are equal)
